item.title: Azure Vms Resource Graph Queries
item.description: Why use Resource Graph instead Az CLI/ PowerShell? If we want to search for resources meeting certain criteria across all our subscriptions, we can’t use Az CLI or Az PowerShell to do this type of queries since it would require a lot of overhead to filter and switch between subscription contexts.
